S06bsu028pu:3: 1 atha khalu bhagavāṃstāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃpraharṣaṇārthaṃ punarapīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paridīpayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S06bsu028pu:4: para prema gaurava prasāda upasthapitvā prajahitva āvaraṇa kleśamalātikrāntāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:6: tānāṃ prajñāya pāramita yatra caranti śūrāḥ // Rgs_1.1 //
S06bsu028pu:7: yāvanti nadya pravahantiha jambudvīpe phala puṣpa auṣadhā(dhi)
S06bsu028pu:12: yāvanti dharma jinaśrāvaka deśayanti bhāṣanti yuktisahitāṃśca udīrayanti /
S06bsu028pu:13: paramārthasaukhyakriya tatphalaprāptitā ca sarvo ayaṃ puruṣakāru tathāgatasya // Rgs_1.3 //
S06bsu028pu:14: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ya jina bhāṣati dharmanetrīṃ tatrābhiśikṣita nararṣabhaśiṣyabhūtāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:15: sākṣātkaritva yatha śikṣita deśayanti buddhānubhāva puna ātmabalānubhāvā // Rgs_1.4 //
S06bsu028pu:16: yasminna prajñavarapāramitopalabdhiḥ na ca bodhisattvaupalabdhi na cittabodheḥ /
S06bsu028pu:17: evaṃ śruṇitva na ca muhyati nāsti trāso so bodhi(sa)
S06bsu028pu:19: na ca rupa vedana na saṃjña na cetanā ca vijñāna sthānu aṇumātra na bhonti tasya /
S06bsu028pu:22: atha śreṇikasya abhutī parivrājakasya jñānopalambhu na hi skandhavibhāvanā ca /
S06bsu028pu:23: yo bodhisattva parijānati eva dharmāṃ na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati so viharāti prajñām // Rgs_1.7 //
S06bsu028pu:24: vyuparīkṣate punarayaṃ katareṣu prajñā kasmātkuto va imi śūnyaka sarva dharmāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:25: vyuparīkṣamāṇu na ca līyati nāsti trāso āsannu so bhavati bodhayi bodhisattvo // Rgs_1.8 //
S06bsu028pu:26: saci rupa saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca vijñāna skandha caratī aprajānamāno /
S06bsu028pu:27: imi skandha śūnya parikalpayi bodhisattvo caratī nimittaanupādapade asakto // Rgs_1.9 //
S06bsu028pu:28: na ca rupa vedana na saṃjña na cetanāyā vijñāni yo na caratī aniketacārī /
S06bsu028pu:29: caratīti so na upagacchati prajñadhārī anupādadhī spṛśati śānti samādhi śreṣṭhām // Rgs_1.10 //
S06bsu028pu:30: evātmaśānti viharanniha bodhisattvo so vyākṛto puramakehi tathāgatehi /
S06bsu028pu:31: na ca manyate ahu samādhitu vyutthito vā kasmārtha dharmaprakṛtiṃ parijānayitvā // Rgs_1.11 //
S06bsu028pu:32: evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñāṃ no cāpi so labhati yatra carāti dharmam /
S06bsu028pu:33: caraṇaṃ ca so 'caraṇaṃ ca prajānayitvā eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.12 //
S06bsu028pu:34: yo 'sau na vidyati sa eṣa avidyamāno tāṃ bālu kalpayi avidya karoti vidyām /
S06bsu028pu:35: vidyā avidya ubhi eti asanta dharmā niryāti yo iti prajānati bodhisattvo // Rgs_1.13 //
S06bsu028pu:36: māyopamāṃ ya iha jānati pañca skandhāṃ na ca māya anya na ca skandha karoti anyān /
S06bsu028pu:37: nānātvasaṃjñavigato upaśāntacārī eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.14 //
S06bsu028pu:38: kalyāṇamitrasahitasya vipaśyakasya trāso na bheṣyati śruṇitva jināna mātrām /
S06bsu028pu:39: yo pāpamitrasahito ca parapraṇeyo so āmabhājana yathodakaspṛṣṭa bhinno // Rgs_1.15 //
S06bsu028pu:40: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ayu pravucyati bodhisattvo sarvatra saṅgakriya icchati saṅgachedī /
S06bsu028pu:41: bodhiṃ spṛśiṣyati jināna asaṅgabhūtāṃ tasmāddhi nāma labhate ayu bodhisattvo // Rgs_1.16 //
S06bsu028pu:42: mahasattva so 'tha kenocyati kāraṇena mahatāya atra ayu bheṣyati sattvarāśeḥ /
S06bsu028pu:43: dṛṣṭīgatāṃ mahati chindati sattvadhātoḥ mahasattva tena hi pravucyati kāraṇena // Rgs_1.17 //
S06bsu028pu:44: mahanāyako mahatabuddhi mahānubhāvo mahayāna uttamajināna samādhirūḍho /
S06bsu028pu:45: mahatā sanaddhu namuciṃ śaṭha dharṣayiṣye mahasattva tena hi pravucyati kāraṇena // Rgs_1.18 //
S06bsu028pu:46: māyākaro yatha catuṣpathi nirmiṇitvā mahato janasya bahu chindati śīrṣakoṭī /
S06bsu028pu:47: yatha te ca māya tatha jānati sarvasattvāṃ nirmāṇu sarva jagato na ca tasya trāso // Rgs_1.19 //
S06bsu028pu:48: rupaṃ ca saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca vijñāna bandhu na ca mukta asaṅgabhūto /
S06bsu028pu:49: evaṃ ca bodhi kramate na ca līnacitto saṃnā ha eṣa varapudgalauttamānām // Rgs_1.20 //
S06bsu028pu:50: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ayu pravucyati bodhiyāno yatrāruhitva sa nirvāpayi sarvasattvān /
S06bsu028pu:51: ākāśatulya ayu yāna mahāvimāno sukhasaukhyakṣemabhiprāpaṇu yānaśreṣṭho // Rgs_1.21 //
S06bsu028pu:52: na ca labhyate ya vrajate diśa āruhitvā nirvāṇaokagamanaṃ gati nopalabdhiḥ /
S06bsu028pu:53: yatha agni nirvṛtu na tasya gatipracāro so tena nirvṛti pravucyati kāraṇena // Rgs_1.22 //
S06bsu028pu:54: pūrvāntato na upalabhyati bodhisattvo aparāntato 'pi pratiupanna triyadhvaśuddho /
S06bsu028pu:55: yo śuddha so anabhisaṃskṛtu niṣprapañco eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.23 //
S06bsu028pu:56: yasmiṃś ca kāli samaye vidu bodhisattvo evaṃ carantu anupādu vicintayitvā /
S06bsu028pu:57: mahatīṃ janeti karuṇāṃ na ca sattvasaṃjñā eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.24 //
S06bsu028pu:58: saci sattvasaṃjña dukhasaṃjña upādayātī hariṣyāmi duḥkha jagatīṃ kariṣyāmi artham /
S06bsu028pu:60: parikalpaku bodhisattvo na ca eṣa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.25 //
S06bsu028pu:61: yatha ātmanaṃ tatha prajānati sarvasattvāṃ yatha sarvasattva tatha prajānati sarvadharmān /
S06bsu028pu:62: anupādupādu ubhaye avikalpamāno eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.26 //
S06bsu028pu:63: yāvanti loki parikīrtita dharmanāma sarveṣupādasamatikramu nirgamitvā /
S06bsu028pu:64: amṛtaṃ ti jñānu paramaṃ na tu yo pareṇa ekārtha prajña ayu pāramiteti nāmā // Rgs_1.27 //
S06bsu028pu:65: evaṃ carantu na ca kāṅkṣati bodhisattvo jñātavya yo vihara te sa upāyaprajño /
S06bsu028pu:66: prakṛtīasanta parijānayamāna dharmāṃ eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.28 //
S06bsu028pu:69: rupasmi yo na sthihate na ca vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāya yo na sthihate na ca cetanāyām /
S06bsu028pu:70: vijñāni yo na sthihate sthitu dharmatāyāṃ eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_2.1 //
S06bsu028pu:73: phalaprāptitāya athito arahantabhūmau pratyekabhūmiathito tatha buddhabhūmau // Rgs_2.2 //
S06bsu028pu:74: yatha nāyako 'sthitaku dhātuasaṃskṛtāyā tatha saṃskṛtāya athito aniketacārī /
S06bsu028pu:75: evaṃ ca sthānu athito sthita bodhisattvo asthānu sthānu ayu sthānu jinena ukto // Rgs_2.3 //
S06bsu028pu:76: yo icchatī sugataśrāvaka haṃ bhaveyaṃ pratyekabuddha bhaviyāṃ tatha dharmarājo /
S06bsu028pu:77: imu kṣāntyanāgami na śakyati prāpuṇetuṃ yatha ārapāragamanāya atītadarśī // Rgs_2.4 //
S06bsu028pu:78: yo dharma bhāṣyati ya bhāṣyati bhāṣyamāṇāṃ phalaprāpta pratyayajino tatha lokanātho /
S06bsu028pu:79: nirvāṇato adhigato vidupaṇḍitehi sarve ta ātmaja nidṛṣṭa tathāgatena // Rgs_2.5 //
S06bsu028pu:80: catvāri pudgala ime na trasanti ye 'smin jinaputra satyakuśalo avivartiyaśca /
S06bsu028pu:81: arhaṃ vidhūtamalakleśa prahīṇakāṅkṣo kalyāṇamitraparipācita yaścaturthaḥ // Rgs_2.6 //
S06bsu028pu:82: evaṃ carantu vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo nārhaṃmi śikṣati na pratyayabuddhabhūmau /
S06bsu028pu:83: sarvajñatāya anuśikṣati buddhadharme śikṣāaśikṣa na ya śikṣati eṣa śikṣā // Rgs_2.7 //
S06bsu028pu:84: na ca rupavṛddhiparihāṇiparigrahāye na ca śikṣati vividhadharmaparigrahāye /
S06bsu028pu:85: sarvajñatāṃ ca parigṛhṇati śikṣamāṇo niryāyatī ya iya śikṣa guṇe ratānām // Rgs_2.8 //
S06bsu028pu:86: rupe na prajña iti rupi na asti prajñā vijñāna saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca /
S06bsu028pu:87: na ca eti prajña iti teṣa na asti prajñā ākāśadhātusama tasya na cāsti bhedaḥ // Rgs_2.9 //
S06bsu028pu:89: ntapārā sattvāna yā ca prakṛtī sa anantapārā /
S06bsu028pu:90: ākāśadhātuprakṛtī sa anantapārā prajñā pi lokavidunāṃ sa anantapārā // Rgs_2.10 //
S06bsu028pu:91: saṃjñeti nāma parikīrtitu nāyakena saṃjñāṃ vibhāviya prahāṇa vrajanti pāram /
S06bsu028pu:92: ye atra saṃjñavigamaṃ anuprāpnuvanti te pāraprāpta sthita pāramite hu bhonti // Rgs_2.11 //
S06bsu028pu:93: saci gaṅgavālukasamāni sthihitva kalpāṃ sattveti śabda parikīrtayi nāyako 'yam /
S06bsu028pu:94: sattvasyupādu kutu bheṣyati ādiśuddho eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_2.12 //
S06bsu028pu:95: evaṃ jino bhaṇati apratikūlabhāṇī yadahaṃ imāya varapāramitāya āsī /
S06bsu028pu:96: tada vyākṛto 'hu parāpuruṣottamena buddho bhaviṣyasi anāgataadhvanasmin // Rgs_2.13 //
S06bsu028pu:99: ya imāṃ grahīṣyati paryāpuṇatī sa nityaṃ prajñāya pāramita yatra caranti nāthāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:100: viṣa vahni śastra udakaṃ na kramāti tasyo otāru māru na ca vindati mārapakṣo // Rgs_3.1 //
S06bsu028pu:101: parinirvṛtasya sugatasya kareyya stūpāṃ pūjeya saptaratanāmayu kaścideva /
S06bsu028pu:102: tehi prapūrṇa siya kṣetrasahasrakoṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikasamaiḥ sugatasya stūpaiḥ // Rgs_3.2 //
S06bsu028pu:103: yāvanta sattva puna tāntaka kṣetrakoṭyo te sarvi pūjana kareyuranantakalpān /
S06bsu028pu:104: divyehi puṣpavaragandhavilepanehi kalpāṃstriyadhvaparikalpa tato 'pi bhūyaḥ // Rgs_3.3 //
S06bsu028pu:105: yaśco imāṃ sugatamāta likhitva puste yata utpatī daśabalāna vināyakānām /
S06bsu028pu:106: dhāreyi satkarayi puṣpavilepanehi kala puṇya bhonti na sa stūpi karitva pūjām // Rgs_3.4 //
S06bsu028pu:107: mahavidya prajña ayu pāramitā janānāṃ dukhadharmaśokaśamanī pṛthusattvadhātoḥ /
S06bsu028pu:108: ye 'tīta ye 'pi ca daśaddiśa lokanāthā ima vidya śikṣita anuttaravaidyarājāḥ // Rgs_3.5 //
S06bsu028pu:109: ye vā caranti cariyāṃ hitasānukampām iha vidyaśikṣita vidu spṛśiṣyanti bodhim /
S06bsu028pu:110: ye saukhya saṃskṛta asaṃskṛta ye ca saukhyā sarve ca saukhya prasutā itu veditavyāḥ // Rgs_3.6 //
S06bsu028pu:111: bījāḥ prakīrṇa pṛthivīsthita saṃbhavanti sāmagri labdhva viruhanti anekarupāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:112: yāvanti bodhiguṇa pāramitāśca pañca prajñāya pāramita te viruhanti sarve // Rgs_3.7 //
S06bsu028pu:113: yenaiva rāja vrajate sa ha cakravartī tenaiva sapta ratanā balakāya sarve /
S06bsu028pu:114: yenaiva prajña iya pāramitā jinānāṃ tenaiva sarvaguṇadharma samāgamanti // Rgs_3.8 //
S06bsu028pu:117: śakro jinena paripṛcchitu praśnamāhu saci gaṅgavālikasamā siya buddhakṣetrāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:118: jinadhātu sarvi paripūrita cūḍibaddhā imameva prajñavarapāramitāhu gṛhṇe // Rgs_4.1 //
S06bsu028pu:119: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na mi śarīri agauravatvaṃ api tū khu prajñaparibhāvita pūjayanti /
S06bsu028pu:120: yatha rājaniśrita naro labhi sarvi pūjāṃ tatha prajñapāramitaniśrita buddhadhātuḥ // Rgs_4.2 //
S06bsu028pu:121: maṇiratna sarvi guṇayukta anarghaprāpto yasmiṃ karaṇḍaki bhave sa namasyanīyaḥ /
S06bsu028pu:122: tasyāpi uddhṛta spṛhanti karaṇḍakasmiṃ tasyaiva te guṇa mahāratanasya bhonti // Rgs_4.3 //
S06bsu028pu:123: emeva prajñavarapāramitāguṇāni yannirvṛte 'pi jinadhātu labhanti pūjām /
S06bsu028pu:125: parighettukāmo so prajñapāramita gṛhṇatu eṣa mokṣo // Rgs_4.4 //
S06bsu028pu:126: pūrvaṃgamā bhavatu dānu dadantu prajñā śīle ca kṣānti tatha vīrya tathaiva dhyāne /
S06bsu028pu:127: parigrāhikā kuśaladharmaavipraṇāśe ekā ca sā api nidarśayi sarvadharmān // Rgs_4. 5 //
S06bsu028pu:128: yatha jambudvīpi bahuvṛkṣasahasrakoṭī nānāprakāra vividhāśca anekarūpāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:129: na vi chāyanānatu bhaveta viśeṣatāpi anyatra chāyagatasaṃkhya prabhāṣamāṇā // Rgs_4.6 //
S06bsu028pu:130: emeva pañca imi pāramitā jinānāṃ prajñāya pāramita nāmatayā bhavanti /
S06bsu028pu:131: sarvajñatāya pariṇāmayamāṇa sarve ṣaḍapīha ekanayamarchati bodhināmā // Rgs_4.7 //
S06bsu028pu:134: saci rūpa saṃjña api vedana cetanāyāṃ cittaṃ anitya pariṇāmayi bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:135: pra(ti)varṇikāya carate aprajānamāno na hi dharma paṇḍita vināśa karoti jātu // Rgs_5.1 //
S06bsu028pu:136: yasmin na rūpa api vedana cāpi saṃjñā vijñāna naiva na pi cetanayopalabdhiḥ /
S06bsu028pu:137: anupādu śūnya na ya jānati sarvadharmān eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_5.2 //
S06bsu028pu:138: yāvanti gaṅganadivālikatulyakṣetre tāvanti sattva arahanti vineya kaścit /
S06bsu028pu:139: yaścaiva prajña ima pāramitā likhitvā parasattvi pustaku dadeya viśiṣṭapuṇyaḥ // Rgs_5.3 //
S06bsu028pu:140: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ta iha śikṣita vādiśreṣṭhā gamayanti dharma nikhilāniha śūnyatāyām /
S06bsu028pu:141: yāṃ śrutva śrāvaka spṛśanti vimukti śīghraṃ pratyekabodhi spṛśayanti ca buddhabodhim // Rgs_5.4 //
S06bsu028pu:142: asato 'ṅkurasya drumasaṃbhavu nāsti loke kuta śākhapatraphalapuṣpaupādu tatra /
S06bsu028pu:143: vina bodhicitta jinasaṃbhavu nāsti loke kuta śakrabrahmaphala śrāvakaprādubhāvaḥ // Rgs_5.5 //
S06bsu028pu:144: ādityamaṇḍalu yadā prabhajāla muñcī karmakriyāsu tada sattva parākramanti /
S06bsu028pu:145: tatha bodhicitta sada lokavidusya jñāto jñānena sarvaguṇadharma samāgamanti // Rgs_5.6 //
S06bsu028pu:146: yatha nopatapta asato bhujagādhipasya kuta nadyaprasravu bhavediha jambudvīpe /
S06bsu028pu:147: asatā nadīya phalapuṣpa na saṃbhaveyuḥ na ca sāgarāṇa ratanā bhavi naikarūpāḥ // Rgs_5.7 //
S06bsu028pu:148: tatha bodhicitta asatīha tathāgatasya kuta jñānaprasravu bhavediha sarvaloke /
S06bsu028pu:149: jñānasya co asati nāsti guṇāna vṛddhiḥ na ca bodhi sāgarasamā na ca buddhadharmāḥ // Rgs_5.8 //
S06bsu028pu:150: yāvanti loki kvaci jotikaprāṇabhūtā obhāsanārtha prabha osarayanti sarve /
S06bsu028pu:151: varasūryamaṇḍalaviniḥsṛta ekaraśmī na kalā pi jyotikagaṇe siya sarvaābhāḥ // Rgs_5.9 //
S06bsu028pu:154: yāvanti śrāvakagaṇāḥ prasavanti puṇyaṃ dānaṃ ca śīlamapi bhāvanasaṃprayuktam /
S06bsu028pu:155: sa hi bodhisattva anumodana ekacitte na ca sarvaśrāvakagaṇe siya puṇyaskandho // Rgs_6.1 //
S06bsu028pu:156: ye buddhakoṭiniyutā purimā vyatītā ye vā anantabahukṣetrasahasrakoṭayaḥ /
S06bsu028pu:157: tiṣṭhanti ye 'pi parinirvṛta lokanāthā deśanti dharmaratanaṃ dukhasaṃkṣayāya // Rgs_6.2 //
S06bsu028pu:158: prathamaṃ upādu varabodhayi cittupādo yāvat su dharmakṣayakālu vināyakānām /
S06bsu028pu:159: ekasmi tatra ciya teṣa jināna puṇyaṃ saha yukta pāramita ye 'pi ca buddhadharmāḥ // Rgs_6.3 //
S06bsu028pu:162: paripiṇḍayitva anumodayi bodhisattvo sarvaṃ ca nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhi // Rgs_6.4 //
S06bsu028pu:163: pariṇāmayantu yadi vartati cittasaṃjñā tatha bodhisattvapariṇāmana sattvasaṃjñā /
S06bsu028pu:164: saṃjñāya dṛṣṭisthitu citta trisaṅgayukto pariṇāmitaṃ na bhavatī upalabhyamānam // Rgs_6.5 //
S06bsu028pu:165: saci eva jānati nirudhyati kṣīṇadharmā taccaita kṣīṇa pariṇāmayiṣyanti yatra /
S06bsu028pu:166: na ca dharma dharmi pariṇāmayate kadācit pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati eva prajānamāne // Rgs_6.6 //
S06bsu028pu:167: saci so nimitta kurute na ca mānayāti atha ānimitta pariṇāmita bhonti bodhau /
S06bsu028pu:168: viṣasṛṣṭa bhojanu yathaiva kriyāpraṇīto tatha śukladharmaupalambha jinena ukto // Rgs_6.7 //
S06bsu028pu:169: tasmā hu nāmapariṇāmana śikṣitavyā yatha te jinā kuśala eva prajānayanti /
S06bsu028pu:170: yajjātiyo 'yaṃ prabhavo yadalakṣaṇaṃ ca anumodamī tatha tathā pariṇāmayāmi // Rgs_6.8 //
S06bsu028pu:171: evaṃ ca puṇya pariṇāmayamāna bodhau na ca so hi buddha kṣipate jina uktavādī /
S06bsu028pu:172: yāvanti loki upalambhikabodhisattvā abhibhonti sarvi pariṇāmayamāna śūro // Rgs_6.9 //
S06bsu028pu:176: vina prajña pañca imi pāramitā acakṣuḥ avināyakā na prabhavanti spṛśetu bodhim // Rgs_7.1 //
S06bsu028pu:177: yatrāntarasmi bhavate pragṛhīta prajñā tatu labdhacakṣu bhavatī imu nāmadheyam /
S06bsu028pu:178: yatha citrakarmapariniṣṭhita cakṣuhīno na ca tāva puṇyu labhate akaritva cakṣuḥ // Rgs_7.2 //
S06bsu028pu:179: yada dharma saṃskṛta asaṃskṛta kṛṣṇaśuklo aṇumātru no labhati prajña vibhāvamānaḥ /
S06bsu028pu:180: yada prajñapāramita gacchati saṃkhya loke ākāśa yatra na pratiṣṭhitu kiṃci tatra // Rgs_7.3 //
S06bsu028pu:181: saci manyate ahu carāmi jināna prajñāṃ mociṣya sattvaniyutāṃ bahurogaspṛṣṭān /
S06bsu028pu:182: ayu sattvasaṃjñaparikalpaku bodhisattvo na ca eṣa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_7.4 //
S06bsu028pu:183: yo bodhisattva varapāramiteti cīrṇo paricārikā ya na ca kāṅkṣati paṇḍitehi /
S06bsu028pu:184: saha śrutva tasya puna bheṣyati śāstṛsaṃjñā so vā laghū anubudhiṣyati bodhi śāntām // Rgs_7.5 //
S06bsu028pu:185: satkṛtya buddhaniyutāṃ paricārikāyāṃ na ca prajñapāramita śraddadhitā jinānām /
S06bsu028pu:186: śrutvā ca so imu kṣipiṣyati so 'lpabuddhiḥ sa kṣipitva yāsyati avīcimatrāṇabhūto // Rgs_7.6 //
S06bsu028pu:187: tasmā hu śraddadhata eva jināna mātāṃ yadi icchathā spṛśitu uttamabuddhajñānam /
S06bsu028pu:188: so vāṇijo yatha vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ mūlātu chedana karitva puna āgameyā // Rgs_7.7 //
S06bsu028pu:191: rūpasya śuddhi phalaśuddhita veditavyā phalarūpaśuddhita sarvajñataśuddhimāhuḥ /
S06bsu028pu:192: sarvajñatāya phalaśuddhita rūpaśuddhī ākāśadhātusamatāya abhinnachinnāḥ // Rgs_8.1 //
S06bsu028pu:193: traidhātukaṃ samatikrānta na bodhisattvā kleśāpanīta upapatti nidarśayanti /
S06bsu028pu:194: jaravyādhimṛtyuvigatāścyuti darśayanti prajñāya pāramita yatra caranti dhīrāḥ // Rgs_8.2 //
S06bsu028pu:195: nāmeva rūpi jagatī ayu paṅkasaktā saṃsāracakri bhramate 'nilacakratulye /
S06bsu028pu:196: jānitva bhrāntu jagatī mṛgavāgureva ākāśa pakṣisadṛśā vicaranti prajñāḥ // Rgs_8.3 //
S06bsu028pu:197: rūpasmi yo na carate pariśuddhacārī vijñāna saṃjña api vedana cetanāyām /
S06bsu028pu:198: evaṃ carantu parivarjayi sarvasaṅgāṃ saṅgādvimucya carate sugatāna prajñām // Rgs_8.4 //
S06bsu028pu:201: evaṃ carantu vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo saṅgā uchinnu vrajate jagatī asakto /
S06bsu028pu:202: sūryo va rāhugrahamukta virocamāno agnīva yukta tṛṇakāṣṭhavanaṃ dahāti // Rgs_9.1 //
S06bsu028pu:203: prakṛtīya śuddha pariśuddhimi sarvadharmāṃ prajñāya pāramita paśyati bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:204: na ca paśyakaṃ labhati nāpi ca sarvadharmān eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_9.2 //
S06bsu028pu:207: śakro jinasya paripṛcchati devarājo caramāṇa prajña katha yujyati bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:208: aṇumātra yo na khalu yujyati skandhadhātau yo eva yujyati(sa yujyati)
S06bsu028pu:210: cirayānaprasthitu sa vedayitavya sattvo bahubuddhakoṭinayutehi kṛtādhikāro /
S06bsu028pu:211: yo śrutva dharmi imi nirmitamāyakalpāṃ na ca kāṅkṣate ayu prayujyati śikṣamāṇaḥ // Rgs_10.2 //
S06bsu028pu:213: janehi gopāla sīma vanasaṃpada paśyate yo /
S06bsu028pu:214: āśvāsaprāpta bhavatī na ca tasya trāso abhyāśa grāmanagarāṇa ime nimittāḥ // Rgs_10.3 //
S06bsu028pu:215: emeva prajñavarapāramitā jinānāṃ śṛṇu tāta yo labhati bodhi gaveṣamāṇaḥ /
S06bsu028pu:216: āśvāsaprāpta bhavatī na ca tasya trāso nārhantabhūmi na pi pratyayabuddhabhūmī // Rgs_10.4 //
S06bsu028pu:217: puruṣo hi sāgarajalaṃ vraji paśyanāya saci paśyate drumavanaspatiśailarājam /
S06bsu028pu:218: athavā na paśyati nimitta nikāṅkṣa bhoti a(bhyāśa)
S06bsu028pu:220: emeva bodhivaraprasthitu veditavyo śruṇamāṇa prajña imi pāramitā jinānām /
S06bsu028pu:221: yadyāpi saṃmukha na vyākṛtu nāyakeno tathapi spṛśiṣyati nacireṇa hu buddhabodhim // Rgs_10.6 //
S06bsu028pu:222: suvasanti kāli patite tṛṇapatraśākhā nacireṇa patraphalapuṣpa samāgamanti /
S06bsu028pu:223: prajñāya pāramita yasyimu hastaprāptā nacireṇa bodhivara prāpsyati nāyakānām // Rgs_10.7 //
S06bsu028pu:224: yatha istri gurviṇi ya ceṣṭati vedanābhi jñātavyu kālu ayamasya prajāyanāya /
S06bsu028pu:225: tatha bodhisattva śruṇamāṇu jināna prajñāṃ rati chanda vīkṣati spṛśiṣyati bodhi śīghram // Rgs_10.8 //
S06bsu028pu:226: caramāṇu prajñavarapāramitāya yogī na ca rūpavṛddhi na ca paśyati pārihāṇim /
S06bsu028pu:227: dharmā adharma imu paśyati dharmadhātuṃ na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati so viharāti prajñām // Rgs_10.9 //
S06bsu028pu:228: caramāṇu yo na iha kalpayi buddhadharmāṃ bala ṛddhipāda na ca kalpayi bodhi śāntām /
S06bsu028pu:229: avikalpakalpavigato 'dhiṣṭhānacārī eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_10.10 //
S06bsu028pu:232: buddhaṃ subhūti paripṛcchati vādicandraṃ kyantantarāyu bhaviṣyanti guṇe ratānām /
S06bsu028pu:233: bahu antarāyu bhaviṣyanti bhaṇāti śāsta tatu alpamātra parikīrtayiṣyāmi tāvat // Rgs_11.1 //
S06bsu028pu:234: pratibhāna neka vividhāni upapadyiṣyanti likhamāna prajña imu pāramitā jinānām /
S06bsu028pu:235: yuta śīghra vidyuta yathā parihāyiṣyanti akaritva artha jagatī imu mārakarma // Rgs_11.2 //
S06bsu028pu:236: kāṅkṣā ca keṣaci bhaviṣyati bhāṣamāṇe na mamātra nāma parikīrtitu nāyakena /
S06bsu028pu:237: na ca jāti bhūmi parikīrtitu nāpi gotraṃ na ca so śruṇiṣyati kṣipiṣyati mārakarma // Rgs_11.3 //
S06bsu028pu:238: evaṃ ta mūlamapahāya ajānamāno śākhāpalāśa parieṣayiṣyanti mūḍhāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:239: hastiṃ labhitva yatha hastipadaṃ gaveṣe tatha prajñapāramita śrutva sūtrānta eṣet // Rgs_11.4 //
S06bsu028pu:240: yatha bhojanaṃ śatarasaṃ labhiyāna kaścit mārgeṣu ṣaṣṭiku labhitva sa bhojanāgryam /
S06bsu028pu:244: satkārakāma bhaviṣyanti ca lābhakāmāḥ sāpekṣacitta kulasaṃstavasaṃprayuktāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:245: choritva dharma kariṣyanti adharmakāryaṃ patha hitva utpathagatā ima mārakarma // Rgs_11.6 //
S06bsu028pu:246: ye cāpi tasmi samaye imu dharma śreṣṭhaṃ śruṇanāya chandika utpādayiṣyanti śraddhām /
S06bsu028pu:247: te dharmabhāṇaka viditvana kāryayuktaṃ premāpanīta gamiṣyanti sudurmanāśca // Rgs_11.7 //
S06bsu028pu:248: imi mārakarma bhaviṣyanti ya tasmi kāle anye ca neka vividhā bahu antarāyā /
S06bsu028pu:249: yehī samākulikṛtā bahu bhikṣu tatra prajñāya pāramita etu na dhārayanti // Rgs_11.8 //
S06bsu028pu:250: ye te bhavanti ratanā ya anarghaprāptā te durlabhā bahupratyarthika nityakālam /
S06bsu028pu:251: emeva prajñavarapāramitā jinānāṃ durlābhu dharmaratanaṃ baddupadravaṃ ca // Rgs_11.9 //
S06bsu028pu:252: navayānaprasthita sa sattva parīttabuddhiḥ ya imaṃ durlābhu dharmaratanaṃ parāpuṇanti /
S06bsu028pu:253: māro 'tra utsuku bhaviṣyati antarāye buddhā daśaddiśi parigrahasaṃprayuktāḥ // Rgs_11.10 //
S06bsu028pu:256: mātrāya putra bahu santi gilāni kāye te sarvi durmanasa tatra prayujyayeyuḥ /
S06bsu028pu:258: daśaddiśi lokadhātau ima prajñapāramita mātra samanvāharanti // Rgs_12.1 //
S06bsu028pu:259: ye 'tīta ye 'pi ca daśaddiśi lokanāthā itu te prasūta bhaviṣyantyanāgatāśca /
S06bsu028pu:260: loka(sya) darśika janetri jināna mātā parasattvacittacaritāna nidarśitā(kā) ca // Rgs_12.2 //
S06bsu028pu:263: ekaiva bhāvavigatā tathatā ananyā prajñāya pāramita buddha tathāgatena // Rgs_12.3 //
S06bsu028pu:264: tiṣṭhantu lokavidunāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ [sthita eṣa dharmataniyāma śūnyadharmā /
S06bsu028pu:265: tāṃ bodhisattva tathatāmanubuddhayanti tasmā hu buddha kṛta nāma tathāgatebhiḥ // Rgs_12.4 //
S06bsu028pu:266: ayu gocaro daśabalāna vināyakānāṃ] prajñāya pāramita ramyavanāśritānām /
S06bsu028pu:267: dukhitāṃśca sattva triapāya samuddharanti na pi sattvasaṃjña api teṣu kadāci bhoti // Rgs_12.5 //
S06bsu028pu:268: siṃho yathaiva girikandari niśrayitvā nadate achambhi mṛga kṣudraka trāsayanto /
S06bsu028pu:269: tatha prajñapāramitaniśraya narāṇa siṃho nadate achambhi pṛthutīrthika trāsayanto // Rgs_12.6 //
S06bsu028pu:270: ākāśaniśrita yathaiva hi sūrya[raśmi] tāpetimāṃ dharaṇi darśayate ca rūpam /
S06bsu028pu:271: tatha prajñapāramitaniśrita dharmarājo tāpeti tṛṣṇanadi dharma nidarśayāti // Rgs_12.7 //
S06bsu028pu:272: rūpasya darśanu adarśanu vedanāye saṃjñāya darśanu adarśanu cetanāye /
S06bsu028pu:273: vijñānacittamanudarśanu yatra nāsti aya dharmadarśanu nidiṣṭu tathāgatena // Rgs_12.8 //
S06bsu028pu:274: ākāśa dṛṣṭu iti sattva pravyāharanti nabhadarśanaṃ kutu vimṛṣyatha etamartham /
S06bsu028pu:275: tatha dharmadarśanu nidiṣṭa tathāgatena na hi darśanaṃ bhaṇitu śakya nidarśanena // Rgs_12.9 //
S06bsu028pu:278: yo eva paśyati sa paśyati sarvadharmān sarvānamātyakiriyā ti upekṣya rājā /
S06bsu028pu:279: yāvanti buddhakriya dharmata śrāvakāṇāṃ prajñāya pāramita sarva karoti tāni // Rgs_13.1 //
S06bsu028pu:280: na ca rāja grāma vrajate na ca rājyarāṣṭrān sarvaṃ ca ādadati so viṣayātu āyam /
S06bsu028pu:281: na ca bodhisattva calate kvaci dharmatāyāṃ sarvāṃśca ādadati ye guṇa buddhadharme // Rgs_13.2 //
S06bsu028pu:284: yasyāmi śraddha sugate dṛḍha bodhisattvo varaprajñapāramitaāśayasaṃprayogo /
S06bsu028pu:285: atikramya bhūmidvaya śrāvakapratyayānāṃ laghu prāpsyate anabhibhū(tu)
S06bsu028pu:287: sāmudriyāya yatha nāvi praluptikāye bhṛtakaṃ manuṣya tṛṇakāṣṭhamagṛhṇamāno /
S06bsu028pu:288: vilayaṃ prayāti jalamadhya aprāptatīro yo gṛhṇate vrajati pārasthalaṃ prayāti // Rgs_14.2 //
S06bsu028pu:289: emeva śraddhasaṃgato ya prasādaprāpto prajñāya pāramita mātra vivarjayanti /
S06bsu028pu:290: saṃsārasāgara tadā sada saṃsaranti jātījarāmaraṇaśokataraṃgabhaṅge // Rgs_14.3 //
S06bsu028pu:291: ye te bhavanti varaprajñaparigṛhītā bhāvasvabhāvakuśalā paramārthadarśī /
S06bsu028pu:292: te puṇyajñānadhanasaṃbhṛtayānapātrāḥ paramādbhutāṃ sugatabodhi spṛśanti śīghram // Rgs_14.4 //
S06bsu028pu:293: ghaṭake apakvi yatha vāri vaheya kācit jñātavyu kṣipra ayu bhetsyati durbalatvāt /
S06bsu028pu:294: paripakvi vāri ghaṭake vahamānu mārge na ca bhedanādbhayamupaiti ca svasti geham // Rgs_14.5 //
S06bsu028pu:295: kiṃcāpi śraddhabahulo siya bodhisattvo prajñāvihīna vilayaṃ laghu prāpuṇāti /
S06bsu028pu:296: taṃ caiva śraddha parigṛhṇayamāna prajñā atikramya bodhidvaya prāpsyati agrabodhim // Rgs_14.6 //
S06bsu028pu:297: nāvā yathā aparikarmakṛtā samudre vilayamupaiti sadhanā saha vāṇijebhiḥ /
S06bsu028pu:298: sā caiva nāva parikarmakṛtā suyuktā na ca bhidyate dhanasamagramupaiti tīram // Rgs_14.7 //
S06bsu028pu:299: emeva śraddhaparibhāvitu bodhisattvo prajñāvihīnu laghu bodhimupaiti hānim /
S06bsu028pu:300: so caiva prajñavarapāramitāsuyukto 'kṣato 'nupāhatu spṛśāti jināna bodhim // Rgs_14.8 //
S06bsu028pu:301: puruṣo hi jīrṇa dukhito śataviṃśavarṣo kiṃcāpi utthitu svayaṃ na prabhoti gantum /
S06bsu028pu:302: so vāmadakṣiṇadvaye puruṣe gṛhīte patanādbhayaṃ na bhavate vrajate sukhena // Rgs_14.9 //
S06bsu028pu:303: emeva prajña iha durbalu bodhisattvo kiṃcāpi prasthihati bhajyati antareṇa /
S06bsu028pu:304: so vā upāyabalaprajñaparigṛhīto na ca bhajyate spṛśati bodhi nararṣabhāṇām // Rgs_14.10 //
S06bsu028pu:307: yo ādikarma sthitu bhūmiya bodhisattvo adhyāśayena vara prasthita buddhabodhim /
S06bsu028pu:308: tehī suśiṣyagurugauravasaṃprayukto kalyāṇamitra sada sevayitavya vijñaiḥ // Rgs_15.1 //
S06bsu028pu:309: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tatu guṇāgamu paṇḍitānāṃ prajñāya pāramita te anuśāsayanti /
S06bsu028pu:310: evaṃ jino bhaṇati sarvaguṇāgradhārī kalyāṇamitramupaniśrita buddhadharmāḥ // Rgs_15.2 //
S06bsu028pu:311: dānaṃ ca śīlamapi kṣānti tathaiva vīryaṃ dhyānāni prajña pariṇāmayitavya bodhau /
S06bsu028pu:312: na ca bodhiskandha vimṛśitva parāmṛśeyā ye ādikarmika na deśayitavya evam // Rgs_15.3 //
S06bsu028pu:313: evaṃ caranta guṇasāgara vādicandrāḥ trāṇā bhavanti jagatī śaraṇā ca lenā /
S06bsu028pu:314: gati buddhi dvīpa pariṇāyaka arthakāmāḥ pradyota ulka varadharmakathī akṣobhyāḥ // Rgs_15.4 //
S06bsu028pu:315: saṃnāhu duṣkarū mahāyaśu saṃnahantī na ca skandhadhātu na ca āyatanaiḥ sanaddhāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:316: tribhi yānasaṃjñavigatā aparigṛhītā avivartikā acalitāśca akopyadharmāḥ // Rgs_15.5 //
S06bsu028pu:318: prajñāya pāramita śrutva na sīdayanti aparapraṇeya avivartiya veditavyāḥ // Rgs_15.6 //
S06bsu028pu:319: gambhīra dharma ayu durdṛśu nāyakānāṃ na ca kenacīdadhigato na ca prāpuṇanti /
S06bsu028pu:320: etārthu bodhimadhigamya hitānukampī alpotsuko ka imu jñāsyati sattvakāyo // Rgs_15.7 //
S06bsu028pu:321: sattvaśca ālayarato viṣayābhilāṣī sthita agrahe abudha yo mahaandhabhūto /
S06bsu028pu:322: dharmo anālayu anāgrahu prāpitavyo lokena sārdha ayu vigrahu prādubhūto // Rgs_15.8 //
S06bsu028pu:325: ākāśadhātu purimādiśi dakṣiṇāyāṃ tatha paścimottaradiśāya anantapārā /
S06bsu028pu:326: uparādharāya daśaddiśi yāvadasti nānātvatā na bhavate na viśeṣaprāptā // Rgs_16.1 //
S06bsu028pu:327: atikrānta yā tathata yā tathatā aprāptā pratyutpanna yā tathata yā tathatārhatānām /
S06bsu028pu:328: yā sarvadharmatathatā tathatārhatānāṃ sarveṣa dharmatathatā na viśeṣaprāptā // Rgs_16.2 //
S06bsu028pu:329: yo bodhisattva imi icchati prāpuṇetuṃ nānātvadharmavigatāṃ sugatāna bodhim /
S06bsu028pu:330: prajñāya pāramita yujyatu yāya yukto vina prajña nāstyadhigamo naranāyakānām // Rgs_16.3 //
S06bsu028pu:331: pakṣisya yojanaśataṃ mahatātmabhāvo pañcāśatā pi abalobhayakṣīṇapakṣo /
S06bsu028pu:332: so trāyatriṃśabhavanādiṣu jambudvīpe ātmānamosariyi taṃ vilayaṃ vrajeyyā // Rgs_16.4 //
S06bsu028pu:333: yadyāpi pañca ima pāramitā jinānāṃ bahukalpakoṭiniyutāṃ samudānayeyyā /
S06bsu028pu:334: praṇidhīnanantavipulāṃ sada sevya loke anupāya prajñavikalā pari śrāvakatve // Rgs_16.5 //
S06bsu028pu:335: niryāyanāya ya icchati buddhajñāne samacitta sarvajagatī pitṛmātṛsaṃjñā /
S06bsu028pu:336: hitacitta maitramana eva parākrameyyā akhilārjavo mṛdugirāya parākrameyyā // Rgs_16.6 //
S06bsu028pu:339: sthaviro subhūti paripṛcchati lokanāthaṃ araṇāya liṅga bhaṇahī guṇasāgarāṇām /
S06bsu028pu:340: avivartiyā yatha bhavanti mahānubhāvā tāṃ vyākuruṣva jinaguṇāna pradeśamātram // Rgs_17.1 //
S06bsu028pu:341: nānātvasaṃjñavigatā gira yuktabhāṇī na ca anya te śramaṇa brāhmaṇa āśrayanti /
S06bsu028pu:342: triyapāyavarjita vidū sadakāli bhonti daśabhiśca te kuśalakarmapathebhi yuktā // Rgs_17.2 //
S06bsu028pu:343: dharmaṃ nirāmiṣu jagasyanuśāsayanti ekāntadharmaniyatāḥ sada snigdhavākyāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:344: sthiticaṃkramaṃ śayaniṣadya susaṃprajānā yugamātraprekṣiṇa vrajantyabhrāntacintā // Rgs_17.3 //
S06bsu028pu:345: śuciśaucaambaradharā trivivekaśuddhā na ca lābhakāma vṛṣabhā sada dharmakāmāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:346: mārasyatītaviṣayā aparapraṇeyā catudhyānadhyāyi na ca niśrita tatra dhyāne // Rgs_17.4 //
S06bsu028pu:347: na ca kīrtikāma na ca krodhaparītacittā gṛhibhūta nitya anadhyoṣita sarva vastuṃ /
S06bsu028pu:348: na ca jīvikāviṣayabhoga gaveṣayanti abhicāramantra na ca istriprayogamantrāḥ // Rgs_17.5 //
S06bsu028pu:349: na ca ādiśanti puruṣaiḥ striya icchakarmāṃ pravivikta prajñavarapāramitābhiyuktāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:350: kalahāvivādavigatā dṛḍhamaitracittā sarvajñakāma sada śāsani nimnacittāḥ // Rgs_17.6 //
S06bsu028pu:352: dharmārtha jīvita tyajanti prayuktayogā avivartiyāna imi liṅga prajānitavyā // Rgs_17.7 //
S06bsu028pu:355: gambhīra rupa api vedana cetanā ca vijñāna saṃjña prakṛtī animittaśāntā /
S06bsu028pu:356: kāṇḍena gādha yatha sāgari eṣamāṇo prajñāya skandha vimṛṣitva alabdhagādhā // Rgs_18.1 //
S06bsu028pu:357: yo bodhisattva imu budhyati eva dharmāṃ gambhīrayānaparamārthanirupalepān /
S06bsu028pu:358: yasmin na skandha na pi āyatanaṃ na dhātu kiṃ vā svapuṇyasamudāgamu kiṃci tasya // Rgs_18.2 //
S06bsu028pu:359: yatha rāgadharmacaritaḥ puruṣaḥ striyāye saṃketa kṛtva alabhantu vivartayeyā /
S06bsu028pu:360: yāvanti cittacaritā divasena tasya tāvanta kalpa anubudhyati bodhisattvo // Rgs_18.3 //
S06bsu028pu:361: yo bodhisattva bahukalpasahasrakoṭayo dānaṃ dadeyu vimalaṃ tatha śīla rakṣe /
S06bsu028pu:362: yaścaiva prajñavarapāramitāprayukto dharmaṃ bhaṇeya kala puṇya na dānaśīle // Rgs_18.4 //
S06bsu028pu:363: yo bodhisattva varaprajña vibhāvayanto tata utthito kathayi dharma nirupalepam /
S06bsu028pu:364: taṃ cāpi nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhau nāsti triloka śubha tena samaṃ bhaveyā // Rgs_18.5 //
S06bsu028pu:365: taṃ caiva puṇya puna khyāyati riktameva tatha śūnya tuccha vaśikaṃ ca asārakaṃ ca /
S06bsu028pu:366: evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñāṃ caramāṇu puṇyu parigṛhṇati aprameyam // Rgs_18.6 //
S06bsu028pu:367: abhilāpamātra ima jānati sarvadharmāṃ buddhena deśita prayukta prakāśitāṃśca /
S06bsu028pu:368: kalpāna koṭinayutāṃ bahu bhāṣamāṇo na ca kṣīyate na ca vivardhati dharmadhātuḥ // Rgs_18.7 //
S06bsu028pu:369: ye cāpi pañca imi pāramitā jinānām ete 'pi dharma parikīrtita nāmamātrāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:370: pariṇāmayāti na ca manyati bodhisattvo na ca hīyate spṛśati uttamabuddhabodhim // Rgs_18.8 //
S06bsu028pu:373: tailasya varti jvalitā prathame nipāte na ca dagdha varti asatā na vinā ya dagdhā /
S06bsu028pu:374: na hi arci paścimanipāta sa varti dagdhā asatā pi paścima na dahyati dīpavarti // Rgs_19.1 //
S06bsu028pu:375: prathameva citta spṛśatī na ca agrabodhim asatā na tasya spṛśatā puna śakya bhonti /
S06bsu028pu:376: na ca citta paścima śivāmanuprāpuṇāti asatā na tasya puna prāpaṇanāya śakyam // Rgs_19.2 //
S06bsu028pu:377: bījātu stamba phala puṣpa samāgamanti so vāniruddha asato na hi tasya vṛkṣo /
S06bsu028pu:378: emeva citta prathamaṃ tu nidāna bodheḥ so vā niruddha asato na hi tasya bodhiḥ // Rgs_19.3 //
S06bsu028pu:379: bījaṃ pratītya ca bhavedyavaśālikādes tattatphalaṃ na ca tadasti na cāpi nāsti /
S06bsu028pu:380: utpattito bhavati bodhiriyaṃ jinānāṃ bhāvasvabhāvavigatā bhavatīha māyā // Rgs_19.4 //
S06bsu028pu:381: udakabindu kumbha paripūryati stokastokaṃ prathame nipāti anupūrva sa paścimena /
S06bsu028pu:382: emeva citta prathamaṃ varabodhihetur anupūrva śuklaguṇapūrṇa bhavanti buddhāḥ // Rgs_19.5 //
S06bsu028pu:383: śūnyānimittapraṇidhiṃ caramāṇu dharmā na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī /
S06bsu028pu:384: yatha nāviko kuśala gacchati ārapāram ubhayānti asthitu na tiṣṭhati arṇavesmin // Rgs_19.6 //
S06bsu028pu:385: evaṃ carantu na ca manyati bodhisattvo ahu vyākṛto daśabalehi spṛśeya bodhim /
S06bsu028pu:386: na ca trāsu bodhi bhavate na ihāsti kiṃcid evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñām // Rgs_19.7 //
S06bsu028pu:387: kāntāramārgi durabhikṣi savyādhi lokāṃ paśyitva nāsti bhaya uttari saṃnahante /
S06bsu028pu:388: aparāntakoṭi sada yukta prajānamāno aṇumātra kheda manaso na upādiyāti // Rgs_19.8 //
S06bsu028pu:391: puna bodhisattva caramāṇu jināna prajñāṃ anupāda skandha imi jānati ādiśūnyān /
S06bsu028pu:392: asamāhito karuṇa prekṣati sattvadhātum atrāntare na parihāyati buddhadharmān // Rgs_20.1 //
S06bsu028pu:393: puruṣo yathā kuśala sarvaguṇairupeto balavān dudharṣu kṛtayogya kalāvidhijño /
S06bsu028pu:395: mātā pitā ca parigṛhya saputradāraṃ kāntāramārgi pratipadya bahūamitro /
S06bsu028pu:396: so nirmiṇitva puruṣān bahu śūravīrān kṣemeṇa gatva puna gehamupāgameyyā // Rgs_20.3 //
S06bsu028pu:397: emeva yasmi samaye vidu bodhisattvo mahamaitri sarvi upabandhati sattvadhātau /
S06bsu028pu:398: caturo sa māra atikramya dvaye ca bhūmim asmin samādhi sthitu no ca spṛśāti bodhim // Rgs_20.4 //
S06bsu028pu:399: ākāśaniśrita samīraṇa āpaskandho ta hi niśritā iha mahāpṛthivī jagacca /
S06bsu028pu:400: sattvāna karmaupabhoganidānameva ākāśasthānu kutu cintayi etamartham // Rgs_20.5 //
S06bsu028pu:401: emeva śūnyatapratiṣṭhitu eṣa sattvo jagati kriyāṃ vividha darśayate vicitrām /
S06bsu028pu:402: sattvāna jñānapraṇidhānaadhiṣṭhānameva na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati śūnyata nāsti sthānam // Rgs_20.6 //
S06bsu028pu:403: yasmiṃśca kāli vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo caratī imāṃ pravara śūnya samādhi śāntām /
S06bsu028pu:404: atrāntare na ca nimitta prabhāvitavyo na ca ānimittasthitu śānta praśāntacārī // Rgs_20.7 //
S06bsu028pu:405: pakṣisya nāsti padu gacchata antarīkṣe no cāpi tatra sthitu no ca patāti bhūmau /
S06bsu028pu:406: tatha bodhisattva caramāṇu vimokṣadvāre na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī // Rgs_20.8 //
S06bsu028pu:407: iṣvastraśikṣita yathā puruṣodha kāṇḍaṃ kṣepitva anya puna kāṇḍa paraspareṇa /
S06bsu028pu:408: patanāya tasya purimasya na deya bhūmim ākāṅkṣamāṇa puruṣasya pateya kāṇḍam // Rgs_20.9 //
S06bsu028pu:409: emeva prajñavarapāramitāṃ caranto prajñā upāya bala ṛddhi vicāramāṇo /
S06bsu028pu:410: tāvanna tāṃ paramaśūnyata prāpuṇoti yāvanna te kuśalamūla bhavanti pūrṇāḥ // Rgs_20.10 //
S06bsu028pu:411: bhikṣū yathā paramaṛddhibalenupeto gagane sthito yamaka kurvati prātihāryāṃ /
S06bsu028pu:412: gaticaṃkramaṃ śayaniṣadya nidarśayāti na nivartate na pi ca khidyati yāva tatra // Rgs_20.11 //
S06bsu028pu:413: emeva śūnyatasthito vidu bodhisattvo jñānarddhipāramigato aniketacārī /
S06bsu028pu:414: vividhāṃ kriyāṃ jagati darśayate anantāṃ na ca bhajyatī na pi ca khidyati kalpakoṭī // Rgs_20.12 //
S06bsu028pu:415: puruṣā yathā mahaprapāti sthihitva kecid ubhi pāṇi chatradvaya gṛhṇa upakṣayeyyā /
S06bsu028pu:416: ākāli vāyuravasṛjya mahāprapāte no ca prapāta patiyāti na yāva tatra // Rgs_20.13 //
S06bsu028pu:417: emeva sthitva karuṇāṃ vidu bodhisattvo prajñāupāyadvayachatraparigṛhīto /
S06bsu028pu:418: śūnyānimittapraṇidhiṃ vimṛṣāti dharmān na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati paśyati dharmacārī // Rgs_20.14 //
S06bsu028pu:419: ratanārthiko yatha vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ labdhvāna ratna puna gehamupāgameyyā /
S06bsu028pu:420: kiṃcāpi tatra sukha jīvati sārthavāho api duḥkhito manasi bhoti sa jātisaṃgho // Rgs_20.15 //
S06bsu028pu:421: emeva śūnyata vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ labdhvāna dhyāna bala indriya bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:422: kiṃcāpi nirvṛti spṛśedabhinandamāno api sarvasattva dukhitā manasī bhavanti // Rgs_20.16 //
S06bsu028pu:423: abhyantare ya nagare nigame ca grāme kāmārtha vāṇiju yathā gami jānanāya /
S06bsu028pu:424: no cāpi tatra sthihatī na ca ratnadvīpe na ca geha mārgi kuśalo puna bhoti vijño // Rgs_20.17 //
S06bsu028pu:425: tatha jñāna śrāvakavimuktisapratyayānāṃ sarvatra bhoti kuśalo vidu bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:426: no cāpi tatra sthihate na ca buddhajñāne na ca saṃskṛte bhavati mārgavidū vidhijño // Rgs_20.18 //
S06bsu028pu:427: yaṃ kāli maitri jagatī anubandhayitvā śūnyānimittapraṇidhī carate samādhim /
S06bsu028pu:428: asthānameva yadi nirvṛti prāpuṇeyā athavāpi saṃskṛta sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ // Rgs_20.19 //
S06bsu028pu:429: yatha nirmito puruṣa no va adṛśyakāyo nāmena vā puna sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ /
S06bsu028pu:430: tatha bodhisattva caramāṇu vimokṣadvāraṃ nāmena vā puna sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ // Rgs_20.20 //
S06bsu028pu:431: yadi pṛcchamāna cari indriya bodhisattvo gambhīradharmaparidīpana no karoti /
S06bsu028pu:432: śūnyānimitta avivartiyabodhidharmāṃ na ca śocatī na ca sa vyākṛtu veditavyo // Rgs_20.21 //
S06bsu028pu:433: arhantabhūmimapi pratyayabuddhabhūmau traidhātukaṃ na spṛśate supināntare 'pi /
S06bsu028pu:434: buddhāṃśca paśyati katheti janasya dharmaṃ avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyo // Rgs_20.22 //
S06bsu028pu:435: triapāyaprāptu supinasmi viditva sattvān praṇidheti tatkṣaṇa apāya ucchoṣayeyam /
S06bsu028pu:436: satyādhiṣṭhāni praśameti sa cāgniskandham avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyo // Rgs_20.23 //
S06bsu028pu:437: bhūtagrahā vividha vyādhaya martyaloke satyādhiṣṭhāni praśameti hitānukampī /
S06bsu028pu:438: na ca tena manyanupapadyati nāpi mānam avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyaḥ // Rgs_20.24 //
S06bsu028pu:441: athavāsya manyanupapadyati vyākṛto 'smi satyādhiṣṭhāna vividhāni samṛddhyayanti /
S06bsu028pu:442: yadi anya vyākṛtaku manyati bodhisattvo jñātavya manyanasthito ayu alpabuddhiḥ // Rgs_21.1 //
S06bsu028pu:443: nāmādhiṣṭhāna puna māra upāgamitvā evaṃ vadiṣyati idaṃ tava nāmadheyam /
S06bsu028pu:444: mātāpitāya anusaptamupaiti vaṃśo buddho yadā bhavi idaṃ tava nāmadheyam // Rgs_21.2 //
S06bsu028pu:445: dhutavṛtta yādṛśu sa bheṣyati yuktayogī pūrvaṃ pi tubhya imi āsi guṇovarūpā /
S06bsu028pu:446: yo eva śrutva abhimanyati bodhisattvo jñātavyu māru paryutthitu alpabuddhiḥ // Rgs_21.3 //
S06bsu028pu:447: pravivikta grāmanagare girikandarāṇi raṇyā vivikta vanaprastha niṣevamāṇo /
S06bsu028pu:448: ātmānukarṣi para paṃsayi bodhisattvo jñātavyu māru paryutthitu alpabuddhiḥ // Rgs_21.4 //
S06bsu028pu:449: grāme ca rāṣṭri nigame viharanti nityaṃ rahapratyayāni spṛhatāṃ janayanti tatra /
S06bsu028pu:450: anyatra sattvaparipācanabodhiyuktā eṣo viveku kathito sugatātmajānām // Rgs_21.5 //
S06bsu028pu:452: no cā viveku imu jānati bodhisattvo saṃkīrṇa so viharate adhimānaprāptaḥ // Rgs_21.6 //
S06bsu028pu:454: abhimanyate na imi raṇyavivekacārī na vivekagocaru ayaṃ hi jinena ukto // Rgs_21.7 //
S06bsu028pu:455: grāmānti yo viharate athavā araṇye dvayayānacittavigato niyato 'grabodhim /
S06bsu028pu:456: eṣo viveku jagadarthabhiprasthitānāṃ ātmā kṣiṇoti tulayeya sa bodhisattvo // Rgs_21.8 //
S06bsu028pu:459: tasmā hu mānu nihanitvana paṇḍitena guruāśayena varabodhi gaveṣamāṇaḥ /
S06bsu028pu:460: vaidyo va ātura svarogacikitsanārthaṃ kalyāṇamitra bhajitavya atandritena // Rgs_22.1 //
S06bsu028pu:461: buddhā ya bodhivaraprasthita bodhisattvā kalyāṇamitra imi pāramitā nidiṣṭāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:462: te cānuśāsaka iyaṃ pratipattibhūmī duvi kāraṇena anubudhyati buddhabodhim // Rgs_22.2 //
S06bsu028pu:463: atikrāntanāgata jinā sthita ye diśāsu sarveṣu mārgu ayu pāramitā ananyo /
S06bsu028pu:464: obhāsa ulka varabodhayi prasthitānām āloka śāstri imi pāramitā pradiṣṭāḥ // Rgs_22.3 //
S06bsu028pu:465: yatha prajñapāramita śūnyata lakṣaṇena tathalakṣaṇā ya imi jānati sarvadharmān /
S06bsu028pu:466: śūnyānalakṣaṇa prajānayamāna dharmān evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñām // Rgs_22.4 //
S06bsu028pu:467: āhārakāma parikalpayamāna sattvāḥ saṃsāri yuktamanasaḥ sada saṃsmaranti /
S06bsu028pu:468: ahu mahya dharma ubhi eti abhūta śūnyā ākāśagaṇṭhi ayu ātmana baddha bāle // Rgs_22.5 //
S06bsu028pu:469: yatha śaṅkitena viṣasaṃjñata abhyupaiti no cāsya koṣṭhagatu so viṣu pātyate ca /
S06bsu028pu:470: emeva bālupagato ahu mahya eṣo ahasaṃjñi jāyi mriyate ca sadā abhūto // Rgs_22.6 //
S06bsu028pu:471: yatha udgraho tatha prakāśitu saṃkileśo vyodāna ukta ahu mahya anopalabdhi /
S06bsu028pu:472: na hi atra kaści yo kliśyati śudhyate vā prajñāya pāramita budhyati bodhisattve // Rgs_22.7 //
S06bsu028pu:473: yāvanta sattva nikhile iha jambudvipe te sarvi bodhivaracitta upādayitvā /
S06bsu028pu:474: dānaṃ daditva bahuvarṣasahasrakoṭīḥ sarvaṃ ca nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhau // Rgs_22.8 //
S06bsu028pu:475: yaścaiava prajñavarapāramitābhiyukto divasaṃ pi antamaśa ekanuvartayeyā /
S06bsu028pu:476: kalapuṇya so na bhavatī iha dānaskandho tadatandritena sada osaritavya prajñā // Rgs_22.9 //
S06bsu028pu:477: caramāṇu prajñavarapāramitāya yogī mahatīṃ janeti karuṇāṃ na ca sattvasaṃjñā /
S06bsu028pu:478: tada bhonti sarvajagatī vidu dakṣiṇīyā satataṃ amoghu paribhuñjati rāṣṭrapiṇḍam // Rgs_22.10 //
S06bsu028pu:479: cirabuddhadevamanujān triapāyi sattvān parimocituṃ ya iha icchati bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:480: pṛthumārgu tīru upadarśayi sattvadhātau prajñāya pāramita yukta divā ca rātrau // Rgs_22.11 //
S06bsu028pu:481: puruṣo ya agru ratanasya alabdhapūrvo aparasmi kāli puna labdhva bhaveya tuṣṭo /
S06bsu028pu:482: sa ha labdhva nāśayi puno 'pi pramādabhūto nāśitva duḥkhi satataṃ ratanābhikāṅkṣī // Rgs_22.12 //
S06bsu028pu:483: emeva bodhivaraprasthita ratnatulyo prajñāya pāramita yogu na riñcitavyo /
S06bsu028pu:484: ratanaṃ va labdhva gṛhamāṇu abhinnasattvo anubuddhayati tvarito śivamabhyupaiti // Rgs_22.13 //
S06bsu028pu:487: udayāti sūryu vigatāśca marīcimālā vidhamitva sarva tamasākulamandhakāram /
S06bsu028pu:488: avibhonti sarva krimijotikaprāṇabhūtāṃ sarvāṃśca tārakagaṇānapi candraābhām // Rgs_23.1 //
S06bsu028pu:489: emeva prajñavarapāramitāṃ caranto vidhamitva dṛṣṭigahanaṃ vidu bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:490: abhibhonti sarvajagatī rahapratyayāṃśca śūnyānimittacarito pṛthu bodhisattvo // Rgs_23.2 //
S06bsu028pu:491: yatha rājaputra dhanadāyaku arthakāmo sarveṣu śreṣṭha bhavate abhigāminīye /
S06bsu028pu:492: sa hyeṣa etarahi sattva pramocayāti prāgeva rājyasthitu bheṣyati paṭṭadhārī // Rgs_23.3 //
S06bsu028pu:493: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo amṛtasya dāyaku priyo marumānuṣāṇām /
S06bsu028pu:494: ayu eṣa eṣati hi sattvasukhābhiyukto prāgeva yāva sthitu bheṣyati dharmarājo // Rgs_23.4 //
S06bsu028pu:497: māro 'pi tasmi samaye bhavate saśalyo śokātu duḥkhitu anantamano 'lpasthāmo /
S06bsu028pu:498: diśadāha ulka kṣipate bhayadarśanārthaṃ kathameṣa dīnamanaso bhavi bodhisattvo // Rgs_24.1 //
S06bsu028pu:499: [yatha te bhavanti vidu āśayasaṃprayuktā divarātri prajñavarapāramitārthadarśī] /
S06bsu028pu:500: tada kāyacitta khagapakṣisatulyabhūtā avatāru so kutu labhiṣyati kṛṣṇabandhuḥ // Rgs_24.2 //
S06bsu028pu:501: kalahāvivādupagatā yada bodhisattvā bhonti parasparaviruddhaka ruṣṭacittāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:502: tada māra tuṣṭu bhavatī paramaṃ udagro ubhi eti dūra bhaviṣyanti jināna jñāne // Rgs_24.3 //
S06bsu028pu:503: ubhi eti dūri bhaviṣyanti piśācatulyā ubhi eti ātma kariṣyanti pratijñahānim /
S06bsu028pu:504: duṣṭāna kṣāntivikalāna kuto 'sti bodhi tada māru tuṣṭu bhavatī namucīsapakṣo // Rgs_24.4 //
S06bsu028pu:505: yo bodhisattva ayu vyākṛtu vyākṛtasmiṃ cittaṃ pradūṣayi vivādu samārabheyyā /
S06bsu028pu:506: yāvanti cittakṣaṇikā khiladoṣayuktās tāvanta kalpa puna saṃnahitavya bhonti // Rgs_24.5 //
S06bsu028pu:507: atha tasyupadyati matīti aśobhanā ti kṣāntīya pāramita bodhi spṛśanti buddhāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:508: pratidarśayāti puna āyati saṃvarāṇi apayāti vā sa iha śikṣati buddhadharme // Rgs_24.6 //
S06bsu028pu:511: yo śikṣamāṇu na upaiti kahiṃci śikṣāṃ na ca śikṣakaṃ labhati nāpi ca śikṣadharmān /
S06bsu028pu:512: śikṣā aśikṣa ubhayo avikalpamāno yo śikṣate sa iha śikṣati buddhadharme // Rgs_25.1 //
S06bsu028pu:513: yo bodhisattva imu jānati eva śikṣāṃ na sa jātu śikṣavikalo bhavate duśīlo /
S06bsu028pu:514: ārādhiteṣu iha śikṣati buddhadharmaṃ śikṣātiśikṣakuśalo ti nirūpalambho // Rgs_25.2 //
S06bsu028pu:515: śikṣantu eva vidu prajña prabhaṃkarāṇāṃ notpadyate akuśalamapi ekacittam /
S06bsu028pu:516: sūrye yathā gagani gacchati antarīkṣe raśmīgate na sthihate purato 'ndhakāram // Rgs_25.3 //
S06bsu028pu:517: prajñāya pāramita śikṣita saṃskṛtānāṃ sarveṣa pāramita bhontiha saṃgṛhītāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:518: satkāyadṛṣṭi yatha ṣaṣṭi duve ca dṛṣṭī antargatāstathami pāramitā bhavanti // Rgs_25.4 //
S06bsu028pu:519: yatha jīvitendriya niruddhi ya kecidanye bhontī niruddha pṛthu indriya yāvadasti /
S06bsu028pu:520: emeva prajñacarite vidu uttamānāṃ sarveta pāramita ukta ya saṃgṛhītā // Rgs_25.5 //
S06bsu028pu:521: ye cāpi śrāvakaguṇā tatha pratyayānāṃ sarveṣu bhonti vidu śikṣitu bodhisattvā /
S06bsu028pu:522: no cāpi tatra sthihatāna spṛheti teṣām ayu śikṣitavyamati śikṣati etamartham // Rgs_25.6 //
S06bsu028pu:525: avivartiyasya varabodhayi prasthitasya yo cittupādu anumoditu āśayena /
S06bsu028pu:526: trisahasra meru tulayitva siyāpramāṇo na tveva tasya kuśalasyanumodanāye // Rgs_26.1 //
S06bsu028pu:527: yāvanta sattva kuśalārthika mokṣakāmā sarveṣa bhonti anumoditu puṇyarāśi /
S06bsu028pu:528: sattvarthi te jinaguṇa ananta prāpuṇitvā dāsyanti dharma jagatī dukhasaṃkṣayāye // Rgs_26.2 //
S06bsu028pu:529: yo bodhisattva avikalpaku sarvadharmān śūnyānimitta parijānati niṣprapañcān /
S06bsu028pu:530: na ca prajña bodhi parieṣati āśayena so yukta prajñavarapāramitāya yogī // Rgs_26.3 //
S06bsu028pu:531: ākāśadhātu gaganasya siyā virodho na hi tena tasya kutu kenacideṣa prāptā /
S06bsu028pu:532: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo abhyovakāśasadṛśo upaśāntacārī // Rgs_26.4 //
S06bsu028pu:533: yatha māyakārapuruṣasya na eva bhoti te śiṣya māṃ janata so ca karoti kāryam /
S06bsu028pu:534: paśyanti taṃ vividha kāryu nidarśayantaṃ na ca tasya kāyu na pi citta na nāmadheyam // Rgs_26.5 //
S06bsu028pu:535: emeva prajñacarite na kadāci bhoti buddhitva bodhi jagatī parimocayitvā /
S06bsu028pu:536: ātmopapatti vividhāṃ kriyasaṃprayogāṃ darśeti māyasadṛśo na vikalpacārī // Rgs_26.6 //
S06bsu028pu:537: yatha buddha nirmita karoti ca buddhakāryaṃ na ca tasyupadyati mado karamāṇu kiṃcit /
S06bsu028pu:538: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo darśeti sarva kriya nirmitamāyatulyam // Rgs_26.7 //
S06bsu028pu:539: palagaṇḍa dakṣa vidunā kṛtu dāruyantro puruṣe stritulya sa karoti ha sarvakāryam /
S06bsu028pu:540: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo jñānena sarva kriya kurvati nirvikalpo // Rgs_26.8 //
S06bsu028pu:543: evaṃ carantu vidu nā pṛthudevasaṃghāḥ kṛtaañjalīpuṭa praṇamya namasyayanti /
S06bsu028pu:544: buddhā pi yāvata daśaddiśi lokadhātau guṇavarṇamālaparikīrtana kurvayanti // Rgs_27.1 //
S06bsu028pu:545: yāvanti gaṅganadivālisame hi kṣetre sattvā ta sarvi parikalpa bhaveyu mārāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:546: ekaika roma puna tāntaka nirmiṇeyyā sarve na śakya karaṇe vidu antarāyam // Rgs_27.2 //
S06bsu028pu:547: catukāraṇehi balavāṃ vidu bodhisattvo bhavate dugharṣu catumāraasaṃprakampyo /
S06bsu028pu:548: śūnyāvihāri bhavate na ca sattvatyāgī yathavādi sattvakaruṇānugatāvasthānaḥ // Rgs_27.3 //
S06bsu028pu:549: yo bodhisattva adhimucyati bhāṣyamāṇām ima prajñapāramita māta tathāgatānām /
S06bsu028pu:550: pratipattiyā ca abhiyujyati āśayena sarvajñatāya abhiprasthitu veditavyo // Rgs_27.4 //
S06bsu028pu:551: na ca dharmadhātutathatāya upaiti sthānaṃ bhavatī athānasthita so laghu antarīkṣe /
S06bsu028pu:552: vidyādharo va abhilambhu vanābhiprāyā khagu kālahīna druma mantrabalādhiṣṭhāno // Rgs_27.5 //
S06bsu028pu:553: evaṃ carantu vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo na ca budhyakaṃ labhati nāpi ca buddhadharmān /
S06bsu028pu:554: na ca deśikaṃ na pi ca paśyaka dharmatāyāṃ śāntaiṣiṇāmayu vihāra guṇe ratānām // Rgs_27.6 //
S06bsu028pu:555: yāvanta śrāvakavihāra sapratyayānāṃ śāntā samādhipraśame sukhasaṃprayuktā /
S06bsu028pu:556: arhanvimokṣa sthapayitva tathāgatānāṃ sarveṣu agra ayu vihāru niruttaraśca // Rgs_27.7 //
S06bsu028pu:557: ākāśi pakṣi viharāti na co patāti dakamadhyi matsya viharāti na co marāti /
S06bsu028pu:558: emeva dhyānabalapāragu bodhisattvo śūnyāvihāri na ca nirvṛti prāpuṇāti // Rgs_27.8 //
S06bsu028pu:559: yo sarvasattvaguṇaagratu gantukāmo agraṃ spṛśeya paramādbhuta buddhajñānam /
S06bsu028pu:560: agraṃ dadeya vara uttamadharmadānam imu agru sevatu vihāru hitaṃkarāṇām // Rgs_27.9 //
S06bsu028pu:563: yāvanti śikṣa paridīpita nāyakena sarveṣa śikṣa ayu agru niruttarā ca /
S06bsu028pu:564: yaḥ sarvaśikṣavidu icchati pāra gantum imu prajñapāramita śikṣati buddhaśikṣām // Rgs_28.1 //
S06bsu028pu:565: agraṃ nidhāna ayu uttamadharmakośa buddhāna gotrajananaṃ sukhasaukhyagañjo /
S06bsu028pu:566: atikrāntanāgata daśaddiśi lokanāthā itu te prasūta na ca kṣīyati dharmadhātuḥ // Rgs_28.2 //
S06bsu028pu:567: yāvanti vṛkṣa phalapuṣpavanaspatī yā sarve ca medinisamudgata prādubhūtāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:568: na ca medinī kṣayamupaiti na cāpi vṛddhiṃ na ca khidyatī na parihāyati nirvikalpā // Rgs_28.3 //
S06bsu028pu:569: yāvanta buddhasama śrāvakapratyayāśca marutaśca sarvajagatī sukhasaukhyadharmāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:570: sarve ti prajñavarapāramitāprasūtā na ca kṣīyate na ca vivardhati jātu prajñā // Rgs_28.4 //
S06bsu028pu:571: yāvanta sattva mṛdumadhyamutkṛṣṭa loke sarve avidyaprabhavā sugatena uktāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:572: sāmagripratyayu pravartati duḥkhayantro na ca yantra kṣīyati avidya na cāpi vṛddhiḥ // Rgs_28.5 //
S06bsu028pu:573: yāvanti jñāna nayadvāra uyāyamūlāḥ sarve ti prajñavarapāramitāprasūtāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:574: sāmagripratyaya pravartati jñānayantro na ca prajñapāramita vardhati hīyate vā // Rgs_28.6 //
S06bsu028pu:575: yo tu pratītyasamutpādu anudbhavāye imu prajña akṣayata budhyati bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:576: so sūrya abhrapaṭale yatha muktaraśmī vidhamitvavidyapaṭalaṃ bhavate svayaṃbhūḥ // Rgs_28.7 //
S06bsu028pu:579: caturbhī ca dhyāna viharanti mahānubhāvā na ca ālayo na pi ca niśrayu kurvayāti /
S06bsu028pu:580: api kho punāśrayu ime catudhyāna sāṅgā bheṣyanti bodhivarauttamaprāpaṇāya // Rgs_29.1 //
S06bsu028pu:581: dhyāne sthito 'tra bhavatī varaprajñalābhī ārūpyarūpi ca samādhi catasra śreṣṭhā /
S06bsu028pu:582: upakāribhūta imi dhyāna varāgrabodhau na punāsravakṣati sa śikṣati bodhisattvo // Rgs_29.2 //
S06bsu028pu:583: āścaryamadbhutamidaṃ guṇasaṃcayānāṃ dhyāne samādhi viharanti nimitta nāsti /
S06bsu028pu:584: tatra sthitāna yadi bhajyati ātmabhāvo puna kāmadhātu upapadyati yathābhiprāyā // Rgs_29.3 //
S06bsu028pu:585: yatha jambudvīpaka manuṣya alabdhapūrvā divi devauttamapurā anuprāpuṇeyā /
S06bsu028pu:586: paśyitva te viṣaya tatra parigṛhītā punarāgameya na ca niśrayu tatra kuryāt // Rgs_29.4 //
S06bsu028pu:587: emeva te guṇadharā varabodhisattvā dhyāne samādhi viharitva prayuktayogī /
S06bsu028pu:588: puna kāmadhātusthita bhonti anopaliptā padmeva vāriṇi aniśrita bāladharme // Rgs_29.5 //
S06bsu028pu:589: anyatra sattvaparipācana kṣetraśodhī paripūraṇārtha imi pāramitā mahātmā /
S06bsu028pu:590: ārūpyadhātuupapatti na prārthayantī yatreha bodhiguṇapāramitāna hāni // Rgs_29.6 //
S06bsu028pu:591: yatha kaścideva puruṣo ratanaṃ nidhānaṃ labdhvā tu tatra spṛhabuddhi na saṃjaneyyā /
S06bsu028pu:592: ekāki so puna gṛhītva parasmi kāle gṛhṇitva geha praviśitva na bhoti lubdho // Rgs_29.7 //
S06bsu028pu:593: emeva dhyāna catureva samādhi śāntāṃ labdhvāna prīti sukhadāṃ vidu bodhisattvāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:594: avasṛjya dhyānasukhaprītisamādhilābhaṃ puna kāmadhātu praviśanti jagānukampī // Rgs_29.8 //
S06bsu028pu:595: yadi bodhisattva viharāti samādhidhyāne rahapratyayāni spṛhabuddhi na saṃjaneyyā /
S06bsu028pu:596: asamāhito bhavati uddhatakṣiptacitto parihīnabuddhiguṇa nāvika bhinnanāvo // Rgs_29.9 //
S06bsu028pu:597: kiṃcāpi rūpamapi śabda tathaiva gandho rasa sparśa kāmaguṇa pañcabhi yukta bhogī /
S06bsu028pu:598: rahapratyayāna vigato 'nantabodhisattvo satataṃ samāhitu prajānayitavya śūro // Rgs_29.10 //
S06bsu028pu:600: yatha kumbhadāsi avaśāvaśa bhartikasya tatha sarvasattvavaśatāmupayānti dhīrāḥ // Rgs_29.11 //
S06bsu028pu:601: na ca svāmikasya prativākyu dadāti dāsī ākruṣṭa cāpi athavā sada tāḍitā vā /
S06bsu028pu:602: ekāntatrastamanasā sa bhayābhibhūtā māmeva so anu vadhiṣyati kāraṇena // Rgs_29.12 //
S06bsu028pu:603: emeva bodhivaraprasthitu bodhisattvo tiṣṭheya sarvajagatī yatha preṣyabhūto /
S06bsu028pu:604: anu bodhiāgamu guṇāna ca pāripūrī tṛṇa agni kāṣṭhaprabhavo dahate tameva // Rgs_29.13 //
S06bsu028pu:605: avasṛjya ātma sugatāṃ parasattvakārye abhiyukta rātridiva niṣpratikāṅkṣacitto /
S06bsu028pu:606: māteva ekasutake paricāryamāṇo adhyāśaye na parikhinna upasthiheti // Rgs_29.14 //
S06bsu028pu:610: na ca khedabuddhi aṇumātra upādiyāti so vīryapāramitayukta atandritaśca // Rgs_30.1 //
S06bsu028pu:611: saci kalpakoṭi gaṇaye vidu bodhisattvo cirasaṃjña bodhi samudāniya tena duḥkhe /
S06bsu028pu:612: ciraduḥkha bheṣyati samācaramāṇu dharmaṃ tatu vīryapāramitahīna kusīdarūpo // Rgs_30.2 //
S06bsu028pu:613: prathamaṃ upādu varabodhayi cittupādo so vā anuttaraśivāmanuprāpuṇeyā /
S06bsu028pu:614: rātriṃdivaikamanasā tamadhiṣṭhiheyā ārambhavīrya vidu paṇḍitu veditavyo // Rgs_30.3 //
S06bsu028pu:615: saci kaścideva vadayeya sumeruśailaṃ bhinditva paśca adhigamyasi agrabodhim /
S06bsu028pu:616: saci khedabuddhi kurute ca pramāṇabuddhiṃ kausīdyaprāpta bhavate tada bodhisattvo // Rgs_30.4 //
S06bsu028pu:617: atha tasyupadyati matī kimutālpamātraṃ kṣaṇamātra bhasma nayatī vilayaṃ sumerum /
S06bsu028pu:618: ārambhavīrya bhavate vidu bodhisattvo nacireṇa bodhivara lapsyati nāyakānām // Rgs_30.5 //
S06bsu028pu:619: saci kāyacittavacasā ca parākrameyyā paripācayitva jagatī kariṣyāmi artham /
S06bsu028pu:620: kausīdyaprāpta bhavatī sthitu ātmasaṃjñaiḥ nairātmabhāvanavidūri nabhaṃ va bhūmeḥ // Rgs_30.6 //
S06bsu028pu:621: yasminna kāyu na pi citta na sattvasaṃjñā saṃjñāvivarti sthitu advayadharmacārī /
S06bsu028pu:622: ayu vīryapāramita ukta hitaṃkareṇa ākāṅkṣamāṇu śivamacyutamagrabodhim // Rgs_30.7 //
S06bsu028pu:623: paruṣaṃ śruṇitva vacanaṃ parato duruktaṃ paritoṣayāti susukhaṃ vidu bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:624: ko bhāṣate ka śṛṇute kutu kasya kena so yukta kṣāntivarapāramitāya vijño // Rgs_30.8 //
S06bsu028pu:625: so bodhisattva kṣamate guṇadharmayukto yaścaiva ratnabharitaṃ trisahasra dadyāt /
S06bsu028pu:626: buddhāna lokavidunārhatapratyayānāṃ kalapuṇya so na bhavate iha dānaskandhe // Rgs_30.9 //
S06bsu028pu:628: [sattvāna śūnyavaradharma niśāmayātī priyu bhoti sarvajagatī kṣamamāṇu vijño // Rgs_30.10 //
S06bsu028pu:629: saci kaści candanapuṭaṃ grahiyāna sattvo abhyokireya gurupremata bodhisattvam /
S06bsu028pu:630: dvitīyo 'pi] agni sakale śirasi kṣipeyā ubhayatra tulyu manu tena upāditavyo // Rgs_30.11 //
S06bsu028pu:631: evaṃ kṣamitva vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo taṃ cittupādu pariṇāmayi agrabodhau /
S06bsu028pu:632: yāvanti kṣānti rahapratyayasattvadhātoḥ abhibhoti sarvajagatī kṣamamāṇu śūraḥ // Rgs_30.12 //
S06bsu028pu:633: kṣamamāṇu eva puna citta upāditavyo narakeṣu tiryayamaloki aneka duḥkhā /
S06bsu028pu:634: anubhūya kāmaguṇahetu akāmakārā kasmā hu adya na kṣameya nidāna bodhau // Rgs_30.13 //
S06bsu028pu:636: yāvanti duḥkha jagatī ahu tatsahāmi kṣāntīya pāramita tiṣṭhati bodhisattvo // Rgs_30.14 //
S06bsu028pu:639: śīlena udgata bhavanti samādhikāṅkṣī sthita gocare daśabalāna akhaṇḍaśīlāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:640: yāvanti saṃvarakriya anuvartayanti tāṃ sarvasattvahita bodhayi nāmayanti // Rgs_31.1 //
S06bsu028pu:641: saci pratyayānarahabodhi spṛhāṃ janeti [duḥśīla bhoti]viduṣāṃ tatha chidracārī /
S06bsu028pu:642: atha bodhi uttamaśivāṃ pariṇāmayanti sthitu śīlapāramita kāmaguṇebhi yukto // Rgs_31.2 //
S06bsu028pu:643: yo dharma bodhiguṇaāgamu sūratānāṃ so śīlaarthu guṇadharmasamanvitānām /
S06bsu028pu:644: yo dharma bodhiguṇahāni hitaṃkarāṇāṃ duḥśīlatā ayu prakāśitu nāyakena // Rgs_31.3 //
S06bsu028pu:645: yadi pañca kāmaguṇa bhuñjati bodhisattvo buddhaṃ ca dharma śaraṇāgatu āryasaṃgham /
S06bsu028pu:646: sarvajñatā ca manasī bhaviṣyāmi buddho sthitu śīlapāramita vedayitavya vijño // Rgs_31.4 //
S06bsu028pu:647: yadi kalpakoṭi daśabhī kuśalaiḥ pathebhiś caramāṇu pratyayarahatvaspṛhāṃ janeti /
S06bsu028pu:648: tada khaṇḍaśīlu bhavate api chidraśīlo pārājiko gurutaro ayu cittupādo // Rgs_31.5 //
S06bsu028pu:649: rakṣantu śīla pariṇāmayi agrabodhiṃ na ca tena manyati na ātmana karṣayethā /
S06bsu028pu:650: ahusaṃjñatā ca parivarjita sattvasaṃjñā sthitu śīlapāramiti vucyati bodhisattvo // Rgs_31.6 //
S06bsu028pu:651: yadi bodhisattva caramāṇu jināna mārge imi śīlavānimi duśīla karoti sattvān /
S06bsu028pu:652: nānātvasaṃjñaprasṛto paramaṃ duśīlo api chidraśīlu na tu so pariśuddhaśīlo // Rgs_31.7 //
S06bsu028pu:653: yasyo na asti ahasaṃjña na sattvasaṃjñā saṃjñāvirāgu kutu tasya asaṃvaro 'sti /
S06bsu028pu:654: yasyo na saṃvari asaṃvari manyanāsti ayu śīlasaṃvaru prakāśitu nāyakena // Rgs_31.8 //
S06bsu028pu:655: yo evaśīlasamanvāgatu niṣprapañco anapekṣako bhavati sarvapriyāpriyeṣu /
S06bsu028pu:656: śirahastapāda tyajamāna adīnacitto sarvāstityāgi bhavate satataṃ alīno // Rgs_31.9 //
S06bsu028pu:657: jñātvā ca dharmaprakṛtīṃ vaśikā nirātmyaṃ ātmāna māṃsa tyajamānu adīnacitto /
S06bsu028pu:658: prāgeva vastu tada bāhira nātyajeyā asthānameta yadi matsari so kareyā // Rgs_31.10 //
S06bsu028pu:659: ahasaṃjñatastu mamatā bhavate ca rāgo kutu tyāgabuddhi bhaviṣyati sā muhānām /
S06bsu028pu:660: mātsarya preta bhavate upapadyayātī athavā manuṣya tada bhoti daridrarūpo // Rgs_31.11 //
S06bsu028pu:661: tada bodhisattva imi jñātva daridrasattvān dānādhimukta bhavatī sada muktatyāgī /
S06bsu028pu:662: catvāri dvīpi samalaṃkṛtu kheṭatulyaṃ dattvā udagra bhavate na hi dvīpalabdho // Rgs_31.12 //
S06bsu028pu:663: dānaṃ daditva vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo yāvanti sattva tribhave samanvāharitvā /
S06bsu028pu:664: sarveṣu teṣu bhavate ayu dattadānaṃ taṃ cāgrabodhi pariṇāmayate jagārtham // Rgs_31.13 //
S06bsu028pu:665: na ca vastuniśrayu karoti daditva dānaṃ vidu pāku naiva pratikāṅkṣati so kadācit /
S06bsu028pu:666: evaṃ tyajitva bhavate vidu sarvatyāgī alpaṃ tyajitva labhate bahu aprameyam // Rgs_31.14 //
S06bsu028pu:667: yāvanta sattva tribhave nikhilena asti te sarvi dāna dadayanti anantakalpān /
S06bsu028pu:668: buddhānuloki vidu nārhatipratyayānāṃ yāvanti śrāvakaguṇān parikalpa sthāne // Rgs_31.15 //
S06bsu028pu:669: yaśco upāyakuśalo vidu bodhisattvo teṣāṃ sa puṇyakriyavastvanumodayitvā /
S06bsu028pu:670: sattvārtha agravarabodhayi nāmayeyā abhibhoti sarvajagatī pariṇāmayukto // Rgs_31.16 //
S06bsu028pu:671: kācasya vā maṇina rāśi siyā mahanto vaiḍūryaratna abhibhoti sa sarva eko /
S06bsu028pu:672: emeva sarvajagatī pṛthu dānaskandho abhibhoti sarvapariṇāmaku bodhisattvo // Rgs_31.17 //
S06bsu028pu:673: yadi bodhisattva dadamāna jagasya dānaṃ mamatāṃ na tatra karayenna ca vastuprema /
S06bsu028pu:674: tatu vardhate kuśalamūla mahānubhāvo candro va tatra prabhamaṇḍalu śuklapakṣe // Rgs_31.18 //
S06bsu028pu:677: dānena pretagati chindati bodhisattvo dāridrakaṃ ca chinatī tatha sarvakleśān /
S06bsu028pu:678: bhogāṃścanantavipulāṃ labhate caranto dānena sattva paripācayi kṛcchraprāptān // Rgs_32.1 //
S06bsu028pu:679: śīlena tīryagati varjayi nekarupām aṣṭau ca akṣaṇa kṣaṇāṃ labhate sa nityam /
S06bsu028pu:680: kṣāntīya rupa labhate paramaṃ udāraṃ suvarṇacchavi priyu jagasya udīkṣaṇīyo // Rgs_32.2 //
S06bsu028pu:681: vīryeṇa śuklaguṇa hāni na abhyupaiti jñānaṃ ananta labhate jinakośagañjam /
S06bsu028pu:682: dhyānena kāmaguṇa utsṛjate jugupsyān vidyā abhijña abhinirharate samādhim // Rgs_32.3 //
S06bsu028pu:683: prajñāya dharmaprakṛtī parijānayitvā traidhātukānta samatikramate apāyān /
S06bsu028pu:684: vartitva cakraratanaṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ deśeti dharma jagatī dukhasaṃkṣayāye // Rgs_32.4 //
S06bsu028pu:685: paripūrayitva imi dharma sa bodhisattvo api kṣetraśuddhi parigṛhṇati sattvaśuddhim /

S06bsu028pu:688: nāmena ratnaguṇasaṃcaya bodhimārgaḥ taṃ sarvasattva itu mārgatu prāpnuvanti // Rgs_32.6 //
S06bsu028pu:692: lokaṃ prāpayituṃ sukhena padavīṃ saṃpaddūyāvāhinīṃ kāruṇyāhitacetasā bhagavatā buddhena saṃdīpitam /
S06bsu028pu:693: śrutvā te 'khiladharmatattvanilayaṃ sūtraṃ samādānato gatvā sthānamaharniśaṃ nijamalaṃ dhmāyantu ye 'bhyāgatāḥ // Rgs_HPr_1 //
S06bsu028pu:694: kāle 'smin bahudṛṣṭisaṃkulakalau pāṭhe 'pi dūraṃ gate gāthābhedamanekapustakagataṃ dṛṣṭvādhunā nyāyataḥ /
S06bsu028pu:695: kūpaṃ vādigajendrakumbhadaraṇe bhadreṇa yā śodhitā lokārthaṃ hariṇā mayā suvihitā seyaṃ budhairgṛhyatām // Rgs_HPr_2 //
S06bsu028pu:696: āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyā bhagavatyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parivartānusāreṇa bhagavatī ratnaguṇasaṃcayagāthā samāptā //
